title: Ireland and Europe must prepare for post-war Ukraine, says Andrews
snippet: Fianna Fáil MEP Barry Andrews has said that Ireland and Europe should prepare for the realities of a post-war Ukraine, saying that Ukraine should be allowed into the EU once their corruption issues are tackled

title: Social media 'geopolitical battleground', says Andrews
snippet: Irish MEP Barry Andrews has warned that social media has "become a geopolitical battleground".
